data.text:
@navyhato Has this become a ‘the world vs putin free-for-all’ now!? Since when are corporations and private citizens entitled to play ‘my-own-lil’-world-politics-crusade’?
 How big of a mindless zealot does one have to be… Seriously.
@navyhato I disagree. They just adapt and conform to any new norm. No questions asked. Aggressive conformists and public gate keepers scare them in place.
@navyhato It’s the “Sciencessssss” you can’t blame the MSM…. https://t.co/D0vE5bxqbI
@navyhato Every MSM outlet has spoken out about hating random Russian people. Who you trying to fool here lol

@navyhato @go_finger Outside of the very few things we see with our own eyes, we pretty much haven’t a clue as to what’s going on. We care about what we’re instructed to care about. https://t.co/0GVAt4vD6L
@navyhato I did not saw any soldier corpse until now...
@CWPparty @navyhato "People hurt faster than institutions" - Saul Alinsky, Rules for Radicals. Let's see how Russia will handle getting fucked with its own tactics
@navyhato So sad for all Russians to be associated with Putin the War Criminal.
